cards.question: Which programming language compiles fastest: Ruby or Javascript?
cards.hint: This node.js app processes requests faster than rails.

cards.question: What is one way a website can store data in a user's browser?
Is Javascript single-thread or multithread?
cards.hint: The Javascript call stack likes to do one thing at a time.

cards.question: How many different values can booleans have?
Is Javascript an object oriented language or a prototype language?
cards.hint: Javascript does not have real classes
